name: 真乃
text: あ……灯織ちゃん
trans: Ah... Hiori-chan.

name: 灯織
text:
……？
真乃？　どうしたの、こんなところで
trans:
...?
Mano? What are you doing here?

name: 真乃
text:
私は、お散歩してたところだよ
灯織ちゃんは？
trans:
I was strolling around.
What about you?

name: 灯織
text: ちょっとＣＤショップに行こうとしてただけ
trans: I was just about to head to the CD shop.

name: 真乃
text: ＣＤショップ……かぁ
trans: CD shop... you say.

name: 真乃
text: あの……私もついて行ってもいいかな？
trans: Um... is it alright if I come along?

name: 灯織
text: え？　……まぁ、別にいいけど
trans: Huh? ...Well, I don't mind.

name: 真乃
text: わぁ、ありがとう
trans: Yay, thank you.

name: 真乃
text:
ほわぁ……ＣＤショップ、面白かった～
いろんなＣＤがたくさんあったね
trans:
Howaa... This CD shop is fascinating～
They have many kinds of CDs in there.

name: 灯織
text: ……ＣＤショップなんだから当たり前でしょ
trans: ...It's a CD shop, so it's expected.

name: 真乃
text: えへへ……そうだよね
trans: Ehehe... You're right.

name: 灯織
text:
（……誰かとこんな風に休日を過ごすのは
いつぶりだろう）
trans:
(...How long has it been since I last spent a day-off
with someone like this...)

name: 灯織
text:
（いつもみたいにそっけなくしちゃってるけど、
真乃は私といて楽しいのかな……）
trans:
(I'm acting bluntly as usual but... I wonder if Mano
enjoys being around me...)

name: 真乃
text: ほわ！　ねえ、灯織ちゃん
trans: Howa! Say, Hiori-chan.

name: 灯織
text: 何？
trans: What is it?

name: 真乃
text:
あそこにいる男の子……迷子じゃないかな
ひとりで、泣いてるみたいで……
trans:
That little boy over there... I wonder if he got lost.
He seems to be crying alone by himself...

name: 灯織
text: ……早く交番に連れて行こう
trans:
...We should hurry and take him to the police
station.

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そうだよね……！
早く行かなくちゃ……！
trans:
S-Sure...!
We need to hurry...!

name: 灯織
text: ふぅ……あの子の親も交番にいてよかった
trans:
Whew... I'm glad the boy's parents also came to
the police station.

name: 真乃
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ...Hehe.

name: 灯織
text: ……急に笑って、何？
trans: ...Why did you laugh all of a sudden?

name: 真乃
text: ううん、灯織ちゃんは優しいなと思って
trans: Well, I was just thinking of how kind you are.

name: 灯織
text: ……別に、優しくなんてないでしょ
trans: ...No, I'm not that nice, really.

name: 真乃
text: ううん、そんなことないよ
trans: Nope, that's not true.

name: 真乃
text:
だって、あの男の子が迷子になって
泣いていたとき……
trans: After all, when that little boy was lost and crying...

name: 真乃
text:
すぐに交番に連れていこうって
言ってくれたのは、灯織ちゃんだよ
trans:
It was you who said that we should bring him to
the police station right away.

name: 灯織
text: あれくらい、当然でしょ
trans: But that's only natural, right?

name: 灯織
text: ……まぁ、好きに考えれば
trans: ...Well, think what you like.
